content.question: For what value of <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, if any, will <math alttext="y equals, k times the sine of, open parenthesis, 5 x, close parenthesis, plus, 2 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 4 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> be a solution to the differential equation <math alttext="y double prime, plus 16 y, equals, negative 27 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 5 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>27</mn></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: There is no such value of <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
